alert.note: Alert for Cheyenne (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 20 at 3:40PM CST until February 23 at 6:00AM CST by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 11 PM TUESDAY TO 5 AM MST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 6 inches in the Laramie Valley and 4 to 7 inches in Cheyenne County. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...In Nebraska, Cheyenne County. In Wyoming, Laramie Valley. * WHEN...From 11 PM Tuesday to 5 AM MST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The dangerously cold wind chills as low as 40 below zero could cause frostbite on exposed skin in 10 minutes or less.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
